'''Ultra-Hot Burner Lamp Test Model''' is a gadget obtained by reaching [[Reputation]] Level 5 in [[Sumeru]].

It consumes [[Ore]]s to increase the efficiency in [[Processing]] [[Food]].

==Overview==
[[File:Ultra Hot Burner Lamp Test Model Usage 1.png|200px|alt=The Accelerate button that appears when processing food]]
[[File:Ultra Hot Burner Lamp Test Model Usage 2.png|200px|alt=The Accelerate window with a choice of ore]]

After this gadget is obtained, a new button will be added to the [[Processing]] menu that opens the Accelerate window.

Using different [[Ore]]s will reduce the remaining processing time by a fixed amount.

* -20s: [[Iron Chunk]]
* -40s: [[White Iron Chunk]], [[Starsilver]]
* -60s: [[Crystal Chunk]], [[Magical Crystal Chunk]], [[Amethyst Lump]]
